title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Culture-Building Project for Improving Language Learning Achievement of Students with Disabilities: Integrated Approach to Grammar, Vocabulary, Reading, and Expression

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency (grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, expression) and team project experience, along with understanding of language learning characteristics in students with disabilities
context.additional_context: A collaborative framework to enhance language learning achievement for students with disabilities in corporate settings. Conducts team-based language problem-solving activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Aims to improve language proficiency through text-based communication and digital literacy enhancement.

learning_goals: Designing PBL (Problem-Based Learning) activities that reflect at least 80% of the language learning needs (grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, expression) of students with disabilities through collaborative instructional design

Collaborating with peer teachers and language education experts to develop at least three types of learner-customized language assessment tools (writing rubric, reading comprehension test, oral presentation evaluation criteria)

Learners can operate a real-time language feedback system on smartphone-based collaboration tools (e.g., KakaoTalk) by: 1) creating three feedback request templates (for writing, presentations, reading), 2) delivering daily language feedback to five team members for two weeks, and 3) achieving an 80% feedback response rate and deriving at least ten language improvement points

Conducting at least five knowledge-sharing sessions among teachers to improve language learning achievement for students with disabilities (e.g., grammar instruction strategies, customized reading material development, expression enhancement techniques)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
